pr_title: GH-2085 naive implementation of RDFStarTripleSource for memory store

timeline.bodyText: FWIW I need to take a closer look at this to make sure, but it's possible that we don't need to handle this here, because it will be filtered out higher up the chain (when statements that use these triples as either subject or object are retrieved).
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.message: GH-2085 ensure source triple iteration is wrapped to handle close
GH-2085 filter out triples that do not match the extValue
